Applicant : Dyorich, Rebecca
School (district) : Ririe Elementary School (Ririe Joint School District 252)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I enjoy gardening, baking, reading, home repairs, entry-level computer science and programming, taking classes, solving math problems, planning, organizing, and seeking creative solutions... I have served in several volunteer positions teaching children and youth, leading an adult women's organization, in secretarial positions, and on planning committees... 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I had an amazing experience working with and learning from Robert and Dana at IHCA last year. I have used things I learned in my classroom and talk to my students and family about career options in the Healthcare industry. I love learning new things and I was able to learn about Healthcare and computer programs that I use more often now because I am more familiar with them. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)

LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I had an amazing experience working with and learning from Robert and Dana at IHCA last year. I have used things I learned in my classroom and talk to my students and family about career options in the Healthcare industry. I love learning new things and I was able to learn about Healthcare and computer programs that I use more often now because I am more familiar with them. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Chemistry
	* No specific preference - anything goes!

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 6



STEM Domain Experience
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I enjoy gardening, baking, reading, home repairs, entry-level computer science and programming, taking classes, solving math problems, planning, organizing, and seeking creative solutions... I have served in several volunteer positions teaching children and youth, leading an adult women's organization, in secretarial positions, and on planning committees... 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Ririe/Idaho Falls
Open to:
	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : rdyorich@ririe252.org
	* Secondary Email : dyorichherd@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2082439231
	* Communication & Availability : After 2:40 pm Monday - Thursday, Most Fridays all day

Other interesting experience:

I have served in several volunteer positions teaching children and youth, leading an adult women's organization, in secretarial positions, and on planning committees... 

LOGISTICS
Residence : Ririe/Idaho Falls
Open to:
	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : rdyorich@ririe252.org
	* Secondary Email : dyorichherd@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2082439231
	* Communication & Availability : After 2:40 pm Monday - Thursday, Most Fridays all day
Applicant : Dyorich, Rebecca
School (district) : Ririe Elementary School (Ririe Joint School District 252)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I had an amazing experience working with and learning from Robert and Dana at IHCA last year. I have used things I learned in my classroom and talk to my students and family about career options in the Healthcare industry. I love learning new things and I was able to learn about Healthcare and computer programs that I use more often now because I am more familiar with them. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Chemistry
	* No specific preference - anything goes!

	* 6

	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Chemistry
	* No specific preference - anything goes!

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 6



STEM Domain Experience
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I enjoy gardening, baking, reading, home repairs, entry-level computer science and programming, taking classes, solving math problems, planning, organizing, and seeking creative solutions... I have served in several volunteer positions teaching children and youth, leading an adult women's organization, in secretarial positions, and on planning committees...

Applicant : Dyorich, Rebecca
School (district) : Ririe Elementary School (Ririe Joint School District 252)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I had an amazing experience working with and learning from Robert and Dana at IHCA last year. I have used things I learned in my classroom and talk to my students and family about career options in the Healthcare industry. I love learning new things and I was able to learn about Healthcare and computer programs that I use more often now because I am more familiar with them.

	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)
